title: Admin Portal Core
description: Secure admin portal for managing landing page content, A/B variants, and analytics

requirements.title: Agent integration trigger
requirements.description: Trigger agent customization run for a specific landing page from factory scenario
requirements.notes: API endpoint or CLI command to spawn Claude Code agent with structured brief

requirements.title: Structured agent input
requirements.description: Agent receives structured brief (text + assets + goals) and writes changes via defined APIs/files only
requirements.notes: Agent should NEVER directly edit arbitrary files; only use configuration APIs

requirements.title: Security by obscurity
requirements.description: Admin portal not linked from any public page or sitemap
requirements.notes: Admin routes on /admin path with no public references. BAS playbook created.

requirements.title: Authentication
requirements.description: Admin portal protected by email/password with bcrypt/argon2 password hashing
requirements.notes: bcrypt authentication implemented (api/auth.go). Session management with httpOnly cookies. BAS playbook created.

requirements.title: Admin home modes
requirements.description: Admin home displays exactly two modes: Analytics / Metrics and Customization
requirements.notes: Admin home page (ui/src/pages/AdminHome.tsx) displays two mode cards. BAS playbook created.

requirements.title: Navigation efficiency
requirements.description: Navigate to any customization card in â‰¤ 3 clicks from admin home
requirements.notes: Both mode cards accessible in 1 click from admin home. BAS playbook created.

requirements.title: Breadcrumb navigation
requirements.description: All admin pages show breadcrumb indicating current location
requirements.notes: Breadcrumb component displays 'Admin' on admin home. BAS playbook created.
